title: A Powerful 30 Minute Grounding Energy Guided Meditation
description:
Dive into this 30-minute grounding energy guided meditation and unlock the transformative power of reconnecting with your roots.  In just half an hour, you'll embark on a journey that not only releases stress and balances your thoughts but also grounds your energy to its core.  This meditation is your passport to anchoring yourself in the present moment, shedding the chaos of daily life, and fostering an unshakable sense of inner peace.  When you ground your energy, you gain the stability to face life's challenges head-on with a calm and centered mind.  Let this meditation be your compass, guiding you to mental clarity, emotional stability, and a deep wellspring of inner strength.  Don't miss this opportunity to tap into the profound grounding energy you possess.  This is an Original guided meditation recorded by us.  

A special thank you to all our monthly supporters!  
We appreciate all your support and contribution to allow this channel to continue to share our guided meditations with the world.  Thank you!!!
If you would like to join our monthly supporters, you can do so here:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/greatmeditation/membership

Credits: 
This recording has been produced by and Exclusively owned by us (Great Meditation).
Voice spoken:  Original commentary recorded by us.
Background Image: Original image produced by, and exclusively owned by us.
Background Music:  Exclusively owned and produced by us
channelDescription:
Our channel consists of a group of individuals collaborating together to produce our very own Original guided meditations Exclusive to Great Meditation.   Each video on our channel features an Original Recording Written, Spoken, Edited and Produced by us.  All our videos contains their own Original Commentary unique to that specific video, adding value to our listeners, and are transformative in nature leading to the best possible viewer experience.  Our value proposition offered to our listeners comes from our Original Voice Recordings which guides the listener into a peaceful state of meditation.   

The background music we use in our meditations have either been produced by us and exclusively owned by us (Great Meditation) or by one of our individual team members.

All background visuals are original artwork produced by us, or are composed from licensed images that have been transformed by us into an original derivative unique to our channel.

comments: Sending my deepest love 💗 to the children of Gaza 😢❤thank you needed this xx
Sending healing and loving energy to the children of Gaza

I normally struggle meditating for longer than 10-15 minutes but this one was truly amazing and didn't realise it was a full 30 minutes until I looked back into the video description. I loved feeling the gratitude from all the beautiful community. I'm so glad we're all on this journey together <3

To all who struggle presently, we will struggle together. We are strong and we are flexible. The Earth will help us overcome all obstacles as we mutually exchange energy and love

❤

I wish you know how you are touching and saving souls from pain,anxiety and depression.
Deep down my being I could feel the gratitude and love I have for you.
Thank you for keeping me alive 🙏
